item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 3:35 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Maliciously crafted GitHub branch name embeds crypto miner into a released package (100 points | 60 comments)
2. Lies I was Told About Collaborative Editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (21 points | 4 comments)
3. Start With the Go Standard Library (22 points | 6 comments)

6. Historically, 4NF explanations are needlessly confusing (15 points | 5 comments)
7. Writing down (and searching through) every UUID (10 points | no comments)
8. Launching the 2024 State of Rust Survey (20 points | 7 comments)
9. Box64 v0.3.2 and Box86 v0.3.8 released (7 points | no comments)
10. Debian opens a can of username worms (13 points | 3 comments)
11. The Pentium FDIV bug, reverse-engineered (3 points | 1 comment)
12. Turn Android Phone to Batteryless Home Server (7 points | 2 comments)
13. funding.json - an open manifest for describing financial requirements for FOSS projects (11 points | 2 comments)
14. frood, an Alpine initramfs NAS (43 points | 14 comments)
15. What are you doing this weekend? (7 points | 16 comments)
16. DaMAgeCard attack targets memory directly thru SD card reader (5 points | no comments)
17. Can one explain schemes to biologists? (2014) (4 points | 3 comments)
18. Ask questions of SQLite databases and CSV/JSON files in your terminal (6 points | 1 comment)
19. Buffered IO in Unix before V7 introduced stdio (3 points | no comments)
20. React 19 is now stable (7 points | no comments)
21. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (39 points | 6 comments)
22. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (35 points | no comments)
23. Optimality of Gerver's Sofa (3 points | no comments)
24. Kubernetes on Hetzner (10 points | no comments)
